description: A React component page for managing and viewing details of a specific connection, including containers, items, comments, and raw JSON data, with client-side data fetching via SWR and Tailwind CSS for styling.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Returns an empty array for static site generation, indicating no pre-rendered connection IDs.

methods.name: ConnectionDetailPage
methods.description: Main React component page that displays the connection details, containers, items, comments, and raw JSON, with routing and tab management.
